alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:28PM MST until November 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph Monday. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands, Owyhee Mountains and Southern Twin Falls County zones. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will produce blowing snow which could quickly cover roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
